name: VOX Audio Engine Package
summary: Learn about .VOXPACK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Several Gameloft video games, including Asphalt 9: Legends, Disney Magic Kingdoms, Sonic Runners Adventure, and Sniper Fury, include VOXPACK files. These archives store the game's music, saved in various lengths and formats. (For example, a VOXPACK file might include a 30 minute, 60 minute, 90 minute, and 120 minute version of the same song.) They also contain a music.voxdata file. This file contains data that the game uses to load and play music correctly.

description: A VOXPACK file is an audio archive used by a Gameloft video game. It contains music played in the game, as well as metadata the game uses to play that music. Most often, the music that VOXPACK files contain is saved in the .MPC, .OGG, or .VXN format.

instructions: VOXPACK files are not meant to be opened. However, players can use Watto Studios Game Extractor to extract the files a VOXPACK file contains.
